name: Cocor Spa Hotel

reviews.title: Awesome hotel next to the beach
reviews.text: Neptun is a great resort on the black sea, and the Hotel Cocor is fantastic. It has great pool, nice rooms, friendly staff, and a good dining facility.

description: Cocor Spa Hotel, with a modern architecture, located in the holiday resort Neptun-Olimp, at 50 m distance from the Black Sea beach, offers you all the facilities required for an unforgettable vacation.The comfort of the 8 suites, 8 family rooms and 226 double rooms (AC, satellite TV, minibar, smoke sensors, card access system) invites you to a dream holiday.
